title: High Tech Rave-type font suggestions?
content:
I am beginning a logo design project and wanted to get some suggestions on some techno-type typefaces. Like the kind you may see on rave flyers. I am fond of Jakita Wide and Cavalero AOE. Any other thoughts?  
Thanks

 [‹ NY Times Magazine Article on Clearview](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829114057/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36013 "Go to previous forum topic") [Popular newspaper fonts? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829114057/http:/www.typophile.com/node/8197 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jonbruns

comments.content: Sounds like you like Garage Band typography. There are many fine books on logos in the public library.
